alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 5:39PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A line of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Millard...northwestern Juab and southwestern Tooele Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 539 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of strong thunderstorms 12 miles southwest of Ibapah, or 24 miles east of Lages Junction, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wendover, Partoun, Fish Springs Wildlife Refuge, Utah Test and Training Range South, Ibapah, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Kings Canyon, Callao, Trout Creek, Gandy and Bonneville Salt Flats. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 1 and 39. US Route 6 between mile markers 0 and 36, and near mile marker 43. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Western Millard and Juab Counties
